thread.title: Oscars blunder sees Moonlight awarded best picture after La La Land is announced as winner | Metro News
thread.title_full: Oscars blunder sees Moonlight awarded best picture after La La Land is announced as winner | Metro News

author: Caroline Westbrook For Metro.Co.Uk
title: Oscars blunder sees Moonlight awarded best picture after La La Land is announced as winner | Metro News
text:
Caroline Westbrook for Metro.co.uk Monday 27 Feb 2017 5:18 am Just to be clear – Moonlight won best picture. Not La La Land (Picture: AFP/Getty Images) 
The biggest Oscars blunder in years saw the best picture award mistakenly given to La La Land – when in fact the real winner was Moonlight. 
Sunday evening’s show saw Warren Beatty announce that Damien Chazelle’s musical had taken the top prize, moments after it won the awards for best director and best actress. 
And it wasn’t until the makers of that film were midway through their acceptance speech before the actor interrupted and said that there had been a mistake – and that Moonlight had in fact won. 
He went on to show the card to the folks at home, confirming that Barry Jenkins’ film was in fact the real winner – much to the shock of the audience. More
